name: Formula One Group
description: Formula One Group, a subsidiary of Liberty Media Corporation, is the premier organization responsible for the management and promotion of Formula One racing worldwide. Established in 1950, Formula One has grown into one of the most popular and prestigious motorsport events, showcasing the pinnacle of automotive engineering and driver skill. The organization oversees the FIA Formula One World Championship, which consists of a series of races known as Grands Prix, held on various circuits around the globe. Formula One Group is committed to innovation and sustainability, with initiatives aimed at reducing the sport's environmental impact while enhancing the fan experience through digital engagement and immersive technologies. The organization also works closely with teams, sponsors, and broadcasters to ensure the growth and popularity of the sport. With a rich history and a focus on the future, Formula One remains a symbol of speed, technology, and global entertainment, captivating millions of fans each season.

seo.meta_title: Formula One Group | The Official Home of Formula 1
seo.meta_description: Explore Formula One Group, the governing body of Formula 1 racing. Discover news, events, and the latest in motorsport technology.

faq.question: What is Formula One?
faq.answer: Formula One is a premier international motorsport competition featuring a series of races known as Grands Prix.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Formula One Group?
faq.answer: Stefano Domenicali is the CEO of Formula One Group.

faq.question: Where is Formula One Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Formula One Group is headquartered in London, United Kingdom.

faq.question: What are the main events organized by Formula One?
faq.answer: The main events organized by Formula One include the Formula One World Championship and various Grands Prix held worldwide.
